H0.text: On what body of water did Jesus supposedly walk. Sea of Galilee

H1.text: On what body of water did Jesus supposedly walk. Jordan River

H2.text: On what body of water did Jesus supposedly walk. Dead Sea

H3.text: On what body of water did Jesus supposedly walk. Kinaret

A4.text: Many of his miracles are also said to have occurred here including his walking on water, calming the storm, the disciples and the miraculous catch of fish, and his feeding five thousand people (in Tabgha).

A5.text: The Sea of Galilee... is also called Kinneret...

A6.text: The Jordan River or River Jordan... drains to the Dead Sea.

A7.text: The Jordan River... flows roughly north to south through the Sea of Galilee
